TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlWriteMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how to write XML data and a relational schema from a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration when setting the parameter of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.XmlWriteMode DiffGram = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Writes the entire <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> as a DiffGram, including original and current values. To generate a DiffGram containing only changed values, call M:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, and then call M:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml(System.IO.Stream)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True as a DiffGram on the returned T:System.Data.DataSet?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.XmlWriteMode IgnoreSchema = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Writes the current contents of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> as XML data, without an XSD schema. If no data is loaded into the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet">, nothing is written.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.XmlWriteMode WriteSchema = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Writes the current contents of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> as XML data with the relational structure as inline XSD schema. If the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> has only a schema with no data, only the inline schema is written. If the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> does not have a current schema, nothing is written.
